app.name: Memory Training Ultimate
app.description: It can be your memory trainer. Funny memory game for kids and adults! Ultimate Memory Training!

app.name: Sudoku 5000+ puzzles
app.description: Pure and simple Sudoku Game. More than 5000+ sudoku puzzles. Divided into 6 level(Easy,Hard,Very Hard,Extreme,Nightmare),There are also 4 categories(Snowflake puzzles, Learning Curve, No Trick ,Superiors).

app.name: HD Media Player - Video Player
app.description: The most powerful Multimedia Player. Both HD Video Player and High quality Music Player.Supported 200+ Video and Audio Formats

app.name: HD Video Player - Movie Player
app.description: Play HD Video,HD Movies. Supports AVI, 3GP, M4V, MOV, MP4, WMV, RMVB, MKV, TS, MPG, FLV, etc.

app.name: AnyMail - Universal Email App
app.description: AnyMail is one the best universal email app for Android.Works with Gmail, Exchange, Yahoo, Outlook, iCloud, Google Apps, HotMail and any IMAP account etc.

app.name: Holy Bible - All In One
app.description: Holy Bible : One of the best Holy Bible app. Support for multiple languages​​, multiple versions of the Bible.

app.name: X2Image Convert to Image
app.description: Convert other file format to image(JPG or PNG). Supported: PDF , XPS , CBZ , JFIF , TIF , PNG , JPG etc

app.name: Notes - To do List
app.description: Good helper to manage your schedules and notes. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memo, email, message, shopping list and to do list.
